abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Iris Lingerie, Boerum Hill, Brooklyn, shop run by Iris Clarke that specializes in custom-fittings and wide-ranging sizes.
lead_paragraph: At Iris Lingerie, in Boerum Hill, Iris Clarke takes an old-fashioned, hands-on approach to finding the perfect fit for customers.

headline.main: At a Brooklyn Shop, Bras From A to M
